catalog_info.title: Supervised Reading and Research
catalog_info.notes: Stephen Mitchell and members of the Committee Applicants must consult the Chairman or the Head Tutor of the Committee. The signature of the Chairman or the Head Tutor is required.
catalog_info.description: Instruction and direction of reading on material not treated in regular courses of instruction; special work on topics in folklore, mythology, and oral literature. Normally available only to concentrators in Folklore and Mythology.
